column5: Im going to be heading to camp for the weekend to see how things over wintered..Thinking I may try shore fishing for Pike? Is anyone local getting any at all?Â  were located just north of Campbellford close to Hwy 7 ... Im not sure if im early or not.. lol.. Also where is a good place to get large minnows out there?
I haven't been able to get pike minnows in the KW/Guelph for a couple months. My buddy was able to get some about a month ago at Bill's in Hamilton...not suckers, big shiners
Awesome..Still too early yet..I went drank beer didnt bother fishing...lol
